string.text: Eliminate Dangerous Mutants
My job is to eliminate mutants in this area.
Recently some mutants have appeared and are threatening our operations. The commander is seeking someone who can take care of them. Here, take a look.
Well done! Well done! Its roars kept ruining my sleep. Here is your reward.
Supply chain

The enemy was transporting supplies but stopped here for some reason. This is a good opportunity to raid them. Those goods might be useful to me or I can bring it to the technician for an extra reward.

Our patrols reported sightings of the enemy's supply goods at this location. For some reason, they haven't brought them to their warehouse yet. Mutant's activity, weather conditions, emission... you name it. Disrupt their supply chain and I'll have something for you. Feel free to keep anything you want. But in case you bring me untouched, you'll get an additional bonus.
Honest pay for honest work. These things are really good, indeed.
Neutralize a High-level Stalker
I need to neutralize a group of stalkers at this location. Expected high-level weaponry and heavy armours.

Recently a group of high-level hostile stalkers have settled here. They prevent people from passing by attacking them on sight. We need this threat neutralized so we can continue with our operations. They are heavily equipped, so plan and prepare accordingly.
Quite a trouble, huh? I envy the guy who provided them those gears. Such good gears. But you have it done.
Eliminate Enemy Gunship
The job is to take down a gunship. A LMG or RPG should be used to deal max damage to it. Watch out for its machine gun - it is extremely dangerous, so seek some cover.

A hostile gunship has appeared recently and is disrupting our operations in the area. The commander has deemed it unacceptable, and it needs to be dealt with. You'll get a considerable bonus if you take it down.
Good! Those damn gunship engine sound still buzzed in my head. Glad it is down.
Transaction
Those guys were corrupted, betrayed their own faction. My job is to kill them all. They are holding a transaction here, where they can be found and, perhaps, where the good stuff can be found too...

I got a contract from a friend. They just found out that some of their members have been corrupted. The dudes did many dirty works, even stealing goods and selling to their enemy. They said that those guys will hold a transaction with a squad of their enemy. Thankfully, they share the same enemy with us so we are hired for this trouble. You need to come there, kill the corrupted guys. They didn't mention about their goods. I think you can keep it. No mention about the bad guys either. Treat them the way you want.
Good job. They owe me a drink for this one. Here is your share.
Artifact Hunting
Doctor said that an artifact could be found here. Let's try my luck, then.
My measure device just found out sign of an artifact. Why don't you come there and try your luck?
Nothing. This line will not be shown in the game.
Artifact "Hunting"
Doctor told me this guy had an artifact. He isn't very friendly though...
Shh... They said this guy got an artifact. He is, shall we say, not a friend of ours, if you catch my mind...
Nothing. This line will not be shown in the game.
Good Weapon
Have heard of this guy having a pretty good gun. I wonder if it would fit my hand...
They told me that this guy got a pretty good gun. He is, of course, not very friendly though. Let's see if you can "borrow" it.
Nothing. This line will not be shown in the game.
